sentences.en: After injury , articular cartilage has limited self - repair ability. The injury tissue cannot form normal hyaline cartilage.
sentences.cn: 关节软骨损伤后 自我 修复能力有限, 不能形成正常透明软骨.

sentences.en: At the far right is pink hyaline material with the appearance of amyloid.
sentences.cn: 最右边呈现粉红色透明样,为淀粉样变性.

sentences.en: Head of fetal bone still made of hyaline cartilage.
sentences.cn: 染色方法同前.胎儿骨的一端,可见仍为通明软骨组成.

sentences.en: Hyaline arteriolosclerosis with hypertension or diabetes mellitus is usually present.
sentences.cn: 高血压或糖尿病时常出现动脉玻璃样变.

sentences.en: Hyaline casts were admixed with neutrophils.
sentences.cn: 玻璃品掺合了嗜中性粒细胞.

sentences.en: In contrast , growth plate cartilage is primary cartilage and is made up of hyaline cartilage.
sentences.cn: 生长板软骨为原发性软骨,由透明软骨构成.

sentences.en: Intercellular hyaline or mucinous substance was always present in between the carcinoma cells.
sentences.cn: 细胞之间常可见伊红染色同质性或黏液样物质.

sentences.en: Objective To explore CT diagnostic values for hyaline - vascular type of giant lymph node hyperplasia ( GLNH ) .
sentences.cn: 目的分析透明血管型巨大淋巴结增生的CT 征象.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To investigate the way to increase the survival from the hyaline membrane disease.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨提高新生儿肺透明膜病生存率的方法.

sentences.en: Objective: To study the possibility of the amnion as hyaline cartilage cells scaffold in tissue - engineering.
sentences.cn: 目的：研究羊膜作为透明软骨细胞组织工程支架材料的可行性。

sentences.en: Renal glomeruli had hyaline changes suggestive of an immunologic process.
sentences.cn: 肾小球有表明免疫学过程的玻璃样变化.

sentences.en: RESULTS:The defects could be repaired completely with hyaline like cartilage at 12 weeks in the diabetes and health groups, while the control group was filled with fibrous tissue.
sentences.cn: 结果：大体观察糖尿病兔和健康兔骨膜移植组在第12周时均能以类透明软骨组织修复缺损，而对照组为纤维肉芽组织。

sentences.en: The acute phase is characterized by edema and hyaline membrane formation.
sentences.cn: 急性期的特征为水肿和透明膜形成,晚期的特征为气腔和(或)间质机化.

sentences.en: The cartilaginous cap contained hyaline cartilage that retained its lacunar pattern.
sentences.cn: 软骨帽中有平顶样的透明软骨.

sentences.en: The morning is as clear as diamond or as hyaline.
sentences.cn: 早上的天空像钻石或玻璃一样清澈.

trans.tran_en: clear and translucent, with no fibres or granules
